com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.document_conversion.v1.model

Class IndexConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.model.GenericModel
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.document_conversion.v1.model.IndexConfiguration

  • public class IndexConfiguration
extends GenericModel
    Structure that stores the configuration for the Retrieve and Rank service when indexing documents through the Document Conversion service.
    See Also:
    DocumentConversion

    • Constructor Detail

      • IndexConfiguration

        public IndexConfiguration(String serviceInstanceId,
                          String clusterId,
                          String searchCollectionName)
        Constructor for the Retrieve and Rank configuration. You will need to get Retrieve and Rank service credentials and create a Solr cluster through the Retrieve and Rank service prior to creating this configuration object.
        Parameters:
        serviceInstanceId - The instance id for the Retrieve and Rank service. To find your service_instance_id, click the tile for your service in Bluemix, and then look at the URL in the browser for the serviceGuid= request parameter. The value for service_instance_id is the value for serviceGuid.
        clusterId - The Solr cluster id from the Retrieve and Rank service
        searchCollectionName - The Solr search collection name

      • IndexConfiguration

        public IndexConfiguration(String serviceInstanceId,
                          String clusterId,
                          String searchCollectionName,
                          IndexFields fields)
        Constructor for the Retrieve and Rank configuration. You will need to get Retrieve and Rank service credentials and create a Solr cluster through the Retrieve and Rank service prior to creating this configuration object.
        Parameters:
        serviceInstanceId - The instance id for the Retrieve and Rank service
        clusterId - The Solr cluster id from the Retrieve and Rank service
        searchCollectionName - The Solr search collection name
        fields - The field mapping object to pass to the Retrieve and Rank service

    • Method Detail

      • getClusterId

        public String getClusterId()
        Gets the cluster id for the Retrieve and Rank service.
        Returns:
        String the cluster id

      • getFields

        public IndexFields getFields()
        Gets the fields object to pass to the Retrieve and Rank service.
        Returns:
        Fields the fields

      • getSearchCollectionName

        public String getSearchCollectionName()
        Gets the search collection name for the Retrieve and Rank service.
        Returns:
        String the collection name

      • getServiceInstanceId

        public String getServiceInstanceId()
        Gets the service instance id for the Retrieve and Rank service. To find your service_instance_id, click the tile for your service in Bluemix, and then look at the URL in the browser for the serviceGuid= request parameter. The value for service_instance_id is the value for serviceGuid.
        Returns:
        String the service instance id
